standard.name: DesertI
standard.description:
(Day) When you travel away from this desert card, draw one less card to choose from.

You look around and see nothing but black ash, volcanic rock, and sand. Many dunes rise high from the black sands.

standard.name: DesertII
standard.description:
(Day) If you draw a friendly civilian, roll a D6, on a 1 or 2 the civilian becomes hostile due to desperation.

Rising from the black ash dunes you think you might see something beneath the sand. It is particularly hot here, enough to drive one mad.

standard.name: DesertIII
standard.description:
(Night) Heal +3 at the end of your turn.

In the midst of the dry ash and sand you see a pool of water before you. A cool breeze blows from its surface. Looking down from the peak of a dune, you feel venerable.

standard.name: MountainI
standard.description:
(Night) Due to the extreme cold you lose 2 hp at the end of your turn.

In the midst of the dry ash and sand you see a pool of water before you. A cool breeze blows from its surface. Looking down from the peak of a dune, you feel venerable.

standard.name: ImpossibleDungeonI
standard.description:
(Always) Start off with two monsters of each type.

(Always) Everytime you attack, lose 2 health.

(Always) On rolls of 3+ spawn additional monster.
